title: Library Attendance System
description: The Library Attendance System is a MERN-based web app for easy tracking of student and faculty library visits. Users can check in and out with a unique ID or barcode for quick, hassle-free access.

title: Library Management System
description: A full-stack Library Management System built using the MERN stack. This system allows an admin to register users, manage books, and track activity.

title: Split Search Algorithm
description: A divide-and-conquer method for finding elements in unsorted arrays. The project features a Python implementation and an HTML visualization to demonstrate its process.
